newsitem.title: USA: Colorado builder elected new Republican chairman.
newsitem.headline: Colorado builder elected new Republican chairman.

text.p: Jim Nicholson, a land developer and building contractor from Colorado, was elected Friday as the new chairman of the Republican Party.
Nicholson, 58, emerged from a field of eight when his remaining rivals withdrew after five ballots of the Republican National Committee.
Nicholson succeeds retiring chairman Haley Barbour in a post that has wielded increasing power in recent years.
He is the Republican Party chairman in Colorado but has no national political experience.
